amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 3 in part B of House Rept. 105-544 to prohibit any Defense Department funds authorized in the bill from being used to assign or deploy any member of the U.S. Armed Forces to serve with the United Nations Rapidly Deployable Mission Headquarters.

action.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 250 - 172 (Roll No. 173).
